trends: There has been one other sighting in Munford
There were no other sightings in Munford on or around August 31st 2008
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home on my way back from visiting my mom. the road i was on is very windy and surrounded by crops \ fields and a few houses. as i approached a three way stop, a flickering light caught my eye just above the tree line in front of me. i came to a complete stop, closed my eyes in disbelief, and when i opened them there were these "stars" or dots of light that were similar to the sparks of a fire work coming up from behind the trees. they were different sizes all relativly small in shape and seemingly close to the trees. they formed roughly a rectangular shape and moved in formation, like a flock of birds caught in the wind or the waving of a flag. as the front moved up and back down, the rest followed. these "stars" shot up from behind the trees up into the air and back down. they did a sort of back flip, soared back into the air and moved in a wave like pattern. imagine aladin on his magic carpet riding in the sky doing flips. that is what these "stars" did. as they crossed the street, still suspended in the sky, they went back down to my right and kept on moving towards the south. i turned right at the three way and attempted to follow them until they got out of sight. the total time from when i spotted them until they disappared out of sight was maybe 20 seconds or less. after a little further investgating, i discovered the "stars" came from a corn field. i have yet to figure out what they were.... and unfortunately i was not able to get pictures but i will keep my eyes open!
